fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 195.71 lakh crore compared with Rs 119.44 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 158.95 points or 0.89% to settle at 17,929.85. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 1.66% to 13.45. Adani Enterprises, Reliance Industries (RIL) and Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
